snippet: Joe Johnson hit a 3-pointer as time expired after Denver had taken a 2-point lead with 0.9 of a second left.
lead_paragraph: Joe Johnson hit a 3-pointer as time expired after Denver had taken a 2-point lead with 0.9 of a second left.

headline.main: Nets’ Buzzer-Beater Gives Them a Victory Over the Nuggets
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Basketball; Nets Edge Nuggets at Buzzer
